name: misclassification
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C or U ] the act of wrongly saying that someone or something is in a particular group or is a particular type: There are laws prohibiting the misclassification of employees. The mis-classification allowed the companies to charge more.
[ C ] something that is wrongly said to be in a particular group or to be a particular type: Items flagged as potential misclassifications were checked against a second list. Some astounding misclassifications were revealed. Related words

misclassify
More examplesFewer examplesMisclassification of tumours may lead to unnecessary surgery.The outcome has been to successfully reduce undervaluation and misclassification of goods.Employers recognize the legal risks of misclassification.The number of misclassifications went down when the new procedure was introduced.
